channel.title: Making a new Home
channel.description: Okay, so I literally just started working on a server for the very first time. I'm pretty confused, I have to say. I have never coded anything this big before and it's a start as for my career I hope to do some programming. Anyway, I am going to try and make a PK server, as that is what I enjoyed the most when I played and still play, yet the server changed a lot... anyway, to start, how can I change my home location? I don't like/know the place it is currently at...

item.title: Making a new Home
item.dc:creator: @Speakmore Speakmore
item.description:
@Speakmore wrote:

Oh I’m sorry, first time really looking at this sort of code so I’m pretty confused and I have a huge list of things I want/need to do with this server. I will search for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a new Home
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

Go to player.java and search for initial x and y - just as the code said…

Read full topic

item.title: Making a new Home
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

Search for this, underneath that will be an X and a Y coord, change them to your liking.

Delta - Player.java

Read full topic

Okay, so I literally just started working on a server for the very first time. I’m pretty confused, I have to say. I have never coded anything this big before and it’s a start as for my career I hope to do some programming.
